title: Game keeps attempting to reconnect at low ping?!
body:
So recently i got the "RiotLauncher.dll" error, so i deleted and re downloaded League of Legends. (know that before I got the error message I had no Disconnecting problems) So the first few games after the re download I had ping up to 500+ all day, and I kept "Attempting to Reconnect". The next day logged on and saw I had 58 ping while a game was loading. I thought my problem was finally over but no.... the first 14 seconds into the game Im "Attempting to Reconnect" with 60 ping? I remember while re downloading it usually ask me to put in the administration password like 4 times. I remember putting it only once or twice then forgetting to sign the other two. When i came back 30 minutes later it was already on the "Wizard Setup Finish" http://www.wikihow.com/Install-League-of-Legends#/Image:Install-League-of-Legends-Step-10.jpg
It acted as if I already put in the two other passwords, but I know for SURE that I didn't. Maybe it was because of that, i don't know. Im Sorry if this is confusing to understand Im not the best at explaining if it's not clear just tell me , please try your best to help me im tired of  "Attempting to Reconnect" all the time!

replies.body: An administration password isn't a normal prompt unless it's due to a setting with your OS.  Regardless, it shouldn't be an issue if you're able to get passed the patcher and into the game.  It sounds like you are having a series of issues though ranging from network to potentially corrupt game files.  As a first step, download our  [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs).  You will find an option for a clean reinstall, which will automatically reinstall your client to a clean slate.  Once completed, test out your experience in a custom game and let me know if you run into any problems!
